questions.question: What were the students supposed to do?

choices.answer: Write about what they learned about at their other schools
Pick a number and write a poem about it
Write about what they did over summer vacation
Pick a color and write a poem about it
Red
Blue
Yellow
Green

questions.question: Why did Rondi switch to writing her poem about blue?

choices.answer: Because Allison made her switch to blue
Because Mrs. Jewls told her to switch with Allison
Because Allison wanted purple (and Allison always gets her way)
Rondi changed her mind and switched to blue on her own
She couldn't find words to rhyme with purple.
She changed her mind to pink.
She couldn't find words to rhyme with blue.
She hated blue, which was the color she chose.

questions.question: Why didn't Rondi write a poem?

choices.answer: She didn't like the color she chose.
She was sent to Mr. Kisdwatter's office.
She never got stated writing one.
She went to recess.
